function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relocation diffusion pattern of COVID-19 in March 2020","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus between countries","Mitigation":"International travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and border controls","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, and surveillance systems","People":"People traveling internationally, border control officials, and global health organizations","Owner":"Government authorities, border control agencies, and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Global mobility and connectivity contributing to disease outbreaks","Impact":"Increased risk of global disease diffusion","Mitigation":"Implementation of stringent travel restrictions, vaccination requirements, and health screening measures","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, vaccination tracking systems, and travel tracking apps","People":"International travelers, border control agencies, and public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and international travel regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Positive link between globalisation and COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Higher exposure to COVID-19 outbreaks in more globalised countries","Mitigation":"Development of international disease surveillance systems, collaboration on public health initiatives, and information sharing between countries","Technologies":"Disease tracking databases, international communication platforms, and global health monitoring tools","People":"Global health organizations, government health departments, and international health agencies","Owner":"International health organizations, government health departments, and global health research institutions"}]}
